text.section:
A barbershop may not employ at the same time more than:
1 apprentice barber for each master barber employed; and
a total of 3 apprentice barbers.
A barbershop may have a separate shampoo area.
The Board may not require a barbershop to have a minimum number of sinks.

section.section: An apprentice barber under complete and constant supervision of a master barber may assist the master barber in starting or completing an operation. The master barber or barbershop may charge the usual fees for the operation.
A fee may not be charged for an operation performed completely by an apprentice barber.
